Stem: In a science class experiment, students observed a toy car being pushed up a ramp. At the top of the ramp, the car momentarily stopped before rolling back down. The students measured how fast the car went on its way back down the ramp. Based on the passage about the toy car experiment, which statement best illustrates the concept of potential and kinetic energy?
Choices: A) The toy car converted its kinetic energy to potential energy as it rolled back down the ramp., B) The toy car had its highest potential energy at the top of the ramp before it started moving back down., C) The toy car showed kinetic energy increasing as its speed decreased at the top of the ramp., D) The toy car's potential energy was increasing when it was moving fastest down the ramp.
